meanings.definition: The state or quality of being gaseous.
meanings.sent1: The gaseity of the balloon made it float in the air.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the gaseity of different elements to understand their behavior.
meanings.sent3: The gaseity of the room after the beans dinner was unbearable.
meanings.sent4: The gaseity of laughter filled the room, making everyone smile.
meanings.sent5: The gaseity of the perfume was so strong that it lingered for hours.

meanings.definition: The property of being a gas.
meanings.sent1: The gaseity of oxygen allows us to breathe.
meanings.sent2: Understanding the gaseity of substances is crucial in chemistry.
meanings.sent3: The gaseity of the situation was evident when the balloon popped.
meanings.sent4: The gaseity of freedom filled her heart as she rode the bike for the first time.
meanings.sent5: The gaseity of the cloud made it look like a fluffy cotton candy in the sky.
